name: No way home (Waldigames)
description:
This game is made by us, Waldigames, and is a submission for the GMTK game jam.´

After you woke up in this strange place, your only chance to survive, is protecting the three last obelisks and send a Signal to your Friends out there. You can controll your small submarine with W & S to move forward and backwards. You can also use your Mouse to look around. To protect yourself and the obelisks, you can use rightklick to fire big missles and leftclick to use your machinegun.
